com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation

Class Register

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Register

  • public class Register
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a register in Mano's computer as detailed in:
    Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
    By M. Morris Mano
    Published by Prentice-Hall, c 1993
    Chapter 5, pp 123-172.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Constructor which is the equivalent of calling Register(int) with an argument of 1.
      Register(int size)
      size must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Register

        public Register()
        Constructor which is the equivalent of calling Register(int) with an argument of 1.

      • Register

        public Register(int size)
        size must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        size - The integer number of bits this Register supports.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        size.

      • valueProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty valueProperty()
        Returns:
        value.

      • value

        public int value()
        Returns:
        ObservableIntegerValue.get() of value.

      • value

        public int value(int a,
                 int b)
        Parameters:
        a - The least to most significant zero-based binary digit index of this value to start at.
        b - The least to most significant zero-based binary digit index of this value to end at.
        Returns:
        integer whose binary representation consists of binary digits on the interval [a, b] of this value.

      • value

        public boolean value(int digit)
        digit must pass Computer.validateDigit(int, int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        digit - The least to most significant zero-based binary digit index of this value to get.
        Returns:
        boolean representing if the binary digit at index digit is a 1.

      • hexadecimalStringBinding

        public javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding hexadecimalStringBinding()
        Returns:
        StringBinding representing value as a hexadecimal String.

      • characterStringBinding

        public javafx.beans.binding.StringBinding characterStringBinding()
        Returns:
        StringBinding representing value as character String.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Loads this Register with 0.

      • load

        public void load(int value)
        value must pass validate(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to load into this Register.

      • validate

        private void validate(int value)
        Validates that this Register could hold value.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to test if this Register can hold.

      • and

        public void and(int value)
        value must pass validate(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to and (&) this Register with.

      • complement

        public void complement()
        Complements this Register.

      • add

        public void add(int value,
                Register e)
        value must pass validate(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to add to this Register.
        e - Register to load with the carry out of this addition operation.

      • max

        public int max()
        Returns:
        Integer representing the maximum unsigned value this Register can hold.

      • increment

        public void increment()
        Increments this Register.

      • add

        public void add(int value)
        value must pass validate(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        value - Integer value to add to this Register.

      • shiftLeft

        public void shiftLeft(Register e)
        Shifts the bits in this Register and e left where e is considered to be the most significant bit.
        Parameters:
        e - Register to load with the last bit in this Register and whose first bit will be loaded into the first bit of this Register.

      • shiftRight

        public void shiftRight(Register e)
        Shifts the bits in this Register and e right where e is considered to be the most significant bit.
        Parameters:
        e - Register to load with the first bit in this Register and whose first bit will be loaded into the last bit of this Register.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The four character hexadecimal representation of this value.
